小暑: (しょうしょ) - "minor heat" solar term (approx. July 7)
小暗がり: (こくらがり) - dimness; dimly lit place
小曲: (しょうきょく) - short piece of music
小望月: (こもちづき) - night before the full moon; 14th day of the lunar calendar
小杉: (kosugi) - thin Japanese paper (usado como tecido durante o período Edo)
小杉原: (こすぎわら) - thin Japanese paper (used as tissue during the Edo period)
小東京: (しょうとうきょう) - epitome of Tokyo; miniature Tokyo
小松引き: (こまつひき) - collecting herbs and pulling out young pine trees by the roots (annual event held on the first Day of the Rat in the New Year)
小松菜: (コマツナ) - Japanese mustard spinach (Brassica rapa var. perviridis)
小板: (こいた) - small plank; piece of wood
小柄: (こがら) - (ant: 大柄・おおがら・1) small build/small stature/petite; (ant: 大柄・おおがら・2) small pattern
小柱: (こばしら) - trough shell adductor muscle; columella
小椋鳥: (こむくどり) - red-cheeked myna (Sturnus phillippensis); violet-backed starling
小楢: (コナラ) - konara oak (Quercus serrata); pin oak
小業: (こわざ) - finer points (e.g. in judo); little tricks
小檀: (コマユミ) - spindle tree; euonymus alatus f. ciliatodentatus
小欲: (しょうよく) - (being) slightly covetous; a little covetousness
小歌: (こうた) - Heian era court lady's song (accompanying men's oouta)/court lady singing a kouta; ditty/ballad/short, hummable, popular tune from Muromachi era to early Edo era; kyogen kouta/style of kyogen song based on the Muromachi songs, often love ballad; noh kouta/unusual style of noh song based on the Muromachi songs
小止み: (おやみ) - lull (e.g. in the rain); break
小正月: (こしょうがつ) - the 14th-16th days of the lunar New Year
小歯朶: (コシダ) - Old World forked fern (Dicranopteris linearis)
小母: (おば) - (used with suffix -san or -sama) endearing term for unrelated older woman; (with suffix -san) term used by a child to address unrelated adult female
小気味よい: (こきみよい) - delightful; satisfying; gratifying; brisk; piquant
小気味よげに: (こきみよげに) - in a gloating manner
小気味好い: (こきみよい) - delightful; satisfying; gratifying; brisk; piquant
小気味良い: (こきみよい) - delightful; satisfying; gratifying; brisk; piquant
小水: (しょうすい) - urine; urination; small quantity of water
小泉チルドレン: (こいずみチルドレン) - the 83 new LDP members of parliament elected in the Sept. 2005 general election; children of (Junichiro) Koizumi
小法廷: (しょうほうてい) - petty bench of the supreme court; small claims court
小海老: (コエビ) - shrimp (infraorder Caridea); small shrimp, prawn or lobster
小海雀: (コウミスズメ) - least auklet (Aethia pusilla)
小満: (しょうまん) - "grain full" solar term (approx. May 21)
小灰蝶: (シジミチョウ) - gossamer-winged butterflies (Lycaenidae spp.)
小為替: (こがわせ) - (former) postal note (abolished in 1951); postal order
小熊のプーさん: (こぐまのプーさん) - Winnie the Pooh
小熊座: (こぐまざ) - Ursa Minor (constellation); the Lesser Bear
小爪川獺: (コツメカワウソ) - Asian small-clawed otter (Aonyx cinerea)
小父: (おじ) - (used with suffix -san or -sama) endearing term for unrelated older man; (with suffix -san) term used by a child to address unrelated adult male
小父さん: (オジサン) - (伯父さん is older than one's parent and 叔父さん is younger) uncle; (usu. 小父さん or おじさん) old man/mister (vocative); (usu. オジサン) manybar goatfish (Parupeneus multifasciatus)
小犬座: (こいぬざ) - Canis Minor (constellation); the Lesser Dog
小狐: (こぎつね) - fox cub; little fox; small fox; juvenile fox
小獅子座: (こじしざ) - {astron} Leo Minor (constellation); the Small Lion
小玉: (こだま) - small ball; globule; bead; small vegetable or piece of fruit
小玉貝: (コタマガイ) - Gomphina melanegis (species of Venus clam)
小甘藻: (コアマモ) - dwarf eelgrass (Nanozostera japonica); Japanese eelgrass
小生: (しょうせい) - (epistolary style) I; me; my humble self
小用: (しょうよう) - (usu. こよう) trifling matter; urination/urine
小田原提灯: (おだわらぢょうちん) - (collapsible) cylindrical paper lantern
小田原評定: (おだわらひょうじょう) - fruitless or inconclusive discussion
小畜: (しょうちく) - small mammal; small animal
小百姓: (こびゃくしょう) - peasant; small farmer
